messageBody:
Hello Guys!!!
I have a bit of problem here, the following the code of the
performance test (time test) that using the Junitpref.

If you look I have setted the "maxTime" for maximum time a test should
take to '0', and still the green bar is showing up, i mean still the
test is passing where as it should not be.



import com.clarkware.junitperf.TimedTest;

import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
import junit.framework.TestSuite;


public class MyTest extends TestCase{

public MyTest(String string) {

super(string);
}

public static Test suite(){
Test suite=new TestSuite();
((TestSuite) suite).addTest(new
MyTest("testMyBrowserStatus"));
return suite;

}

public Test testMyBrowserStatus(){
long maxTime=0;

Test test1=new Webtest1("testClaimsBrowseByStatus");
System.out.println("testing");
Test test11=new TimedTest(test1,maxTime);
System.out.println("testing11");
return test11;
}
